name: HyperX Cloud III Wireless
description: Legendary HyperX comfort with 120-hour battery life. Features DTS Headphone:X spatial audio, 53mm drivers, and signature Cloud comfort for marathon sessions.

reviews.review_text: 120 hours battery is not a typo. It actually lasts that long.
HyperX comfort is still the best for long gaming.
Sound is good but not audiophile level.
